item.description:
We will focus on using the Law of Attraction to embrace our lowest energy level, The Dark Side, better known by Debbie Ford as "The Shadow", which most choose to hide. Those who hang on to it tightly usually manifest intense levels of anger, fear, followed by disease. Yet there are ways to release, embrace, and bring ourselves back to a higher energy level, back to a state of Peace, Love and Happiness.

Join Me this Month as we Explore:

* Embracing the Shadow.

* Releasing Disease or Dis-Ease

* Redefining the Loss of a Loved One

* Near Death Experience

* Beyond the Grave


Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

Topics this Month:

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Embracing our Dark Side
